quests.title: Creative Alchemist
quests.description: Spend 20 minutes on a creative activity that brings you joy. Creativity is the soul's way of expressing its deepest truths.
objectives: Choose any creative activity that calls to you
Let joy and flow guide the process
tips: Drawing, writing, music, cooking - all creativity counts
There's no wrong way to be creative

quests.title: Purpose Pathfinder
quests.description: Reflect on your life purpose and write down one concrete step toward it. The path reveals itself to those who seek.
objectives: Reflect deeply on what gives your life meaning
Identify one specific step toward that purpose
Commit to taking that step within the next week
tips: Purpose doesn't have to be grand - it just has to be yours
Start with what energizes and fulfills you
Small steps in the right direction create momentum

quests.title: Mindfulness Master
quests.description: Practice 10 minutes of meditation or mindfulness to center yourself. In stillness, wisdom speaks.
objectives: Find a quiet space for meditation or mindfulness
Focus on breath, body, or present moment awareness
Return gently to focus when mind wanders
tips: Guided meditations are great for beginners
Wandering mind is normal - gently return focus
Even 5 minutes can make a meaningful difference

quests.title: Wisdom Seeker
quests.description: Read or listen to something that expands your perspective on life. Wisdom transforms information into understanding.
objectives: Choose content that challenges or expands your thinking
Engage deeply, not just passively consuming
Reflect on how this new perspective applies to your life
tips: Philosophy, spirituality, psychology - all sources of wisdom
Ask 'How does this change how I see things?'

quests.title: Legacy Architect
quests.description: Do something today that contributes to your long-term vision or legacy. Every great legacy is built one day at a time.
objectives: Clarify what legacy or impact you want to have
Take one concrete action toward that vision today
Focus on contribution, not just personal achievement
tips: Legacy can be as simple as how you treat people
Think beyond yourself - how can you contribute?
Consistent small actions create lasting impact

quests.title: Transcendence Guide
quests.description: Help someone else grow or overcome a challenge without expecting anything in return. True fulfillment comes through lifting others.
objectives: Identify someone who could benefit from your help
Focus entirely on their growth and benefit
tips: Share your experience and lessons learned
Listen first to understand their real needs
Sometimes the gift is simply believing in someone
